ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISBLANK(b3o__Form__c), ISBLANK(b3o__Question_Set__c), ISBLANK(b3o__External_Link__c), ISBLANK(b3o__Document__c), ISBLANK(b3o__Document_Template__c), ISBLANK(b3o__Session__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a Document, Template, Form, Question Set or an External Link to this document
